text: Rogue Male may refer to: * Rogue Male (novel), a novel by Geoffrey Household published in 1939 ** Man Hunt (1941 film), a 1941 film adaption of Household's novel, directed by Fritz Lang ** Rogue Male (1976 film), a 1976 BBC television adaptation of Household's novel, directed by Clive Donner * Rogue Male (band), a British heavy metal band
title: Rogue Male
